mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(userId, division, subject, content, eventFilename, createdstart, createdend) VALUES( #{userId},#{division},#{subject}, #{content}, #{eventFilename}, #{createdstart}, #{createdend})
mapper.select: SELECT eventnum,userId,division,subject,content,eventFilename,DATE_FORMAT(createdstart,'%Y-%m-%d')createdstart,DATE_FORMAT(createdend,'%Y-%m-%d')createdend FROM event ORDER BY eventNum DESC LIMIT #{start},10;
